text: Hulk is a 2003 action video game based on the 2003 Ang Lee movie of the same name. It was developed by Radical Entertainment. It had Eric Bana returning as the voice of Bruce Banner from the movie. It is also a sequel to the events of the movie. ==Gameplay== The game has levels where the Hulk can destroy the environment and where Bruce Banner can stealthily avoid enemies. ==Plot== It has been 8 years since Bruce Banner returned from South America. ==Other websites== * * Category:2003 video games Category:Hulk games Category:3D beat 'em ups Category:Nintendo GameCube games Category:PlayStation 2 games Category:Single-player video games Category:Stealth video games Category:Superhero video games Category:Video game sequels Category:Video games based on movies Category:Windows games Category:Xbox games
